name: Powermat
overview: Powermat was established in 2007 in response to the explosion of electronic devices flooding todayâ€™s market and the growing need to provide a simple, smart, efficient and clutter-free approach for simultaneously powering multiple devices. Powermat allows users to enable their electronic devices once with a Powermat receiver and then set down up to three devices on the charging mat for safe and effective wireless charging. Itâ€™s simple, effortless, and provides consumers with first-of-its-kind freedom from the need to constantly plug/unplug as well as the angst of running on empty. Moreover, Powermat eliminates the tangle of wires that result from multiple cords overload; virtually eliminating â€˜cord fatigueâ€™ among consumers toting more and more â€œmust haveâ€ gadgets.

milestones.description: GM And Powermat Find Love In Vegas, Announces A $5 Million Deal That Puts Powermats In Cars
